700373f-a.text:
West 253rd Street (Riverdale Lane), east from Fieldston Road.
April 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.

701048f-a.text:
Fieldston Road, east side, at West 253rd Street (Riverdale Lane), showing a 3-story frame house occupying the N.E. corner and, among the trees, the 2-story brick building of the Neighborhood School.
The view is in a southeasterly direction.
April 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
An exclusive view of the house at the N.E. corner, as seen from
West 253rd Street.
April 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
Ng.No 27
(3)
An additional view of the house, as seen from West 253rd Street.
April 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.

700374f-a.text:
West 253rd Street (Riverdale Lane), east of the N.E. corner of Fieldston Road, showing the residence "Knollwood" and its approach at the above location. Bromley's map of 1900 shows it to be the home of
Geo. Lynn.
April 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.

700375f-a.text:
West 253rd Street (Riverdale Lane), east of the N.E. corner of Fieldston Road, showing the stable on the residential estate "Knollwood". Bromley's 1900 map shows it to have been on the estate of Geo. Lynn.
April 23, 1935
P.L. Sperr.
